text: Peter MacGregor-Scott (December 28, 1947 â€“ October 25, 2017) was an American movie producer. He was born in Maidenhead, Berkshire, England. He produced the 1997 movie, Batman & Robin. He also produced the Cheech & Chong movie Cheech & Chong's The Corsican Brothers, Still Smokin and Born in East L.A.. Others are The Whoopee Boys and Death to Smoochy. MacGregor-Scott was involved in a traffic collision in New York City which would result in his death on October 25, 2017, aged 69."Peter Macgregor-Scott, Producer on The Fugitive and Batman Forever, Dies at 69", hollywoodreporter.com; accessed October 31, 2017. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American movie producers Category:Road accident deaths in New York (state)
title: Peter MacGregor-Scott
